condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2022, the Ministry of Education has strategies, tools and models to improve the provision of quality inclusive pre-primary, primary and secondary education services with a culturally relevant and risk management approach.

description.narrative: UNICEF CO contributed to the implementation of the territorial strategy for inclusion and quality of education developed by Ministry of Education. The components implemented with technical and financial support from UNICEF Ecuador were: in-service school-based teacher training with emphasis on literacy skills; multi-grade school programme, culture of peace; increased access to WASH; and disaster preparedness and response within the education sector. All components aim at increase quality of policies and programs at national level while reaching significant numbers of children in prioritized territories. All together 140 541 children, 5 095 teachers and 10 776 adults were reached through this strategy. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of children reached with pre-primary, primary and secondary online/distance education lesson with UNICEF support in the reporting year [COVID]
Plan or protocol to provide an educational response in emergency contexts

baseline.value: Documents on policies for school safety.

target.value: 2022:Costing of the implementation of an emergency response protocol in the education sector, including a training strategy and relevant support

actual.value: 2019:Project in implementation. Baseline information collected, school-based plans and implementation on course.

title.narrative: Public institutions count with shared policies for flexible educational offers, which includes the necessary adjustments to the current normative, the organic structure and budget estimations

baseline.value: Programs are operating under inadequate normatives, insuffient funding and under-trained staff.

target.value: 2022:The program for flexible educational offers counts with a policy costing, a normative proposal and training proposal.

actual.value: 2019:Pilot developed and implemented in the province of Esmeraldas. Lessons learned need to be systematized and a new strategy developed.
